resources.string: Image represents the store logo or other store image.

This is an exemplary store description which is expected to be multiline. Thus we are using a very long string description to see how the overall behaviour of the card view will be with long descriptions.

This is an exemplary discount description which is expected to be multiline. Thus we are using a very long string description to see how the overall behavior of the card view will be with long descriptions.
The bast place to look for discounts!
